Agensi: Foto Shownu MONSTA X Dimanipulasi
04 Nov 2019, 15:00 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Agensi menyebut akan mengambil langkah hukum atas penyebaran foto-foto pria yang diduga adalah Shownu MONSTA X. (dok. MONSTA X/YouTube)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Agensi Starship Entertainment memutuskan menempuh langkah hukum atas penyebaran foto-foto Shownu MONSTA X. Dalam pernyataan resmi, Starship menyanggah bahwa pria yang ada di foto merupakan Shownu. Menurut agensi, foto itu telah dimanipulasi. "Foto-foto yang dimanipulasi secara ilegal terkait Shownu telah meyebar secara online dan di media sosial. Kami akan mengajukan laporan kepada polisi tentang orang pertama yang mengunggah foto tersebut, serta mereka ikut menyebarkan foto," demikian pernyataan Starship."Kami akan bekerja sama dengan kuasa hukum kamu untuk menempuh langkah hukum yang tegas lewat gugatan sipil atas kerugian yang terjadi akibat pelanggaran Undang-Undang Spesial terkait Kriminalitas Seksual, menyebarkan konten yang dianggap pornografi atas Undang-Undang Penggunaan Jaringan dan Informasi, serta pelanggaran privasi."Starship menyebut bahwa mereka telah mengumpulkan informasi tentang orang-orang yang menyebarkan informasi palsu serta menuliskan komentar jahat terhadap artis mereka sejak Juli lalu. Pada akhir pekan lalu, para penggemar dibuat heboh dengan tersebarnya foto yang menampilkan seorang pria yang terlihat seperti Shownu MONSTA X. Dalam foto itu, pria tersebut tidur hanya mengenakan pakaian dalam. Sementara foto-foto yang lain disebut lebih eksplisit, di mana pria yang sama tidak menggunakan apa-apa. Foto-foto itu diduga diambil tanpa sepengetahuan si pria.Sebelum kasus foto yang mirip dirinya itu, Shownu telah terlibat kontroversi. Ia diduga sempat menjalin hubungan dengan wanita bersuami. Namun Starship Entertainment mengklarifikasi bahwa Shownu memiliki kontak dengan si wanita sebelum ia menikah. Wanita itu dikatakan menikah pada bulan Agustus dan Shownu tidak mengetahui hal tersebut. Suami si wanita sempat mengontak agensi dan kedua belah pihak telah bertemu. Dalam pernyataan resmi Starship sebelumnya, Shownu pribadi mengatakan tidak akan mengganggu rumah tangga seseorang. Belakangan ini MONSTA X sedang mengalami banyak ujian. Kontroversi itu diawali oleh Wonho yang memutuskan keluar dari grup setelah ia diduga memiliki utang dan catatan kriminal sebelum jadi idol. Tak lama berselang, rumor Shownu menjalin hubungan dengan wanita bersuami pun mencuat. (kir/rea)

Agency: Photo Shownu MONSTA X Manipulated
Nov 04 2019, 3:00 PM by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The agency said it would take legal action over the distribution of photographs of men suspected of being Shownu MONSTA X. (doc. MONSTA X / YouTube)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The Starship Entertainment Agency has decided to take legal action over the distribution of photos of Shownu MONSTA X. In an official statement, Starship has denied that the man in the photo is Shownu. According to the agency, the photo has been manipulated. "Illegally manipulated photos related to Shownu have been spread online and on social media. We will file a report with the police about the first person to upload the photos, and they will also share the photos," the Starship statement said. "We will work with your power of attorney to take strict legal steps through civil lawsuits for losses incurred as a result of violating the Special Law relating to Sexual Crime, spreading pornographic content under the Network and Information Use Act, and violating privacy. "Starship said that they had gathering information about people who spread false information and writing malicious comments against their artists since last July. At the end of last week, the fans were made excited by the spread of photos showing a man who looked like Shownu MONSTA X. In the photo, the man slept only wearing underwear. While the other photos are called more explicit, where the same man uses nothing. The photos were allegedly taken without the knowledge of the man. Before the photo case that resembles him, Shownu has been involved in controversy. He allegedly had a relationship with a married woman. But Starship Entertainment clarified that Shownu had contact with the woman before he married. The woman was said to be married in August and Shownu did not know this. The woman's husband had contacted the agency and the two sides had met. In an official Starship statement earlier, Shownu personally said it would not interfere with one's household. Lately MONSTA X is undergoing many tests. The controversy was started by Wonho who decided to leave the group after he was suspected of having debts and criminal records before becoming an idol. Not long ago, rumors of Shownu's relationship with married women were sticking out. (kir / rea)
